column4: Hi, i just installed ubuntu and it can't start X. i get an error saying that no devices were detected and that no screens were found. I have a p4 2.8 in an abit 875p board with a geforce6800 and audigy 2.
anyone wanna help? heh.
lol... this is why i love irc.
isn't hoary not supposed to be out for another month or so?
i'm upgrading to it right now......hopefully
so, this is a brand-new warty install, and X won't load?
yes
if I was doing it, before I tried messing with anything else, I'd go down to http://ubuntuguide.org and follow the directions for "installing the nvidia drivers"
if you've got a problem with your video modules or something that would just neatly sidestep it
yeah, that site is actually really cool; there's all kinds of stuff there that is really handy
yes, unfortunately it *does* look like ubuntuguide.org is down. i've still got it up on my machine, but i can't load it on this other one. odd.
if you really want to try out hoary, just edit /etc/apt/sources.list and change each instance of "warty" to "hoary" ...then run (as root) 'apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade'
is hoary fairly stable?
i have no idea; this upgrade i'm in the middle of will be my first experience.
ok. thanks :)
how's the update goin?
done!
mine just finished as well
seems to be working fine....no major changes except maybe to the layout
now i'm working on installing asterisk, which is why i upgraded
oooh... pbx niftyness :)
